Package Database

Class DBAppointments

java.lang.Object
Database.DBAppointments
public class DBAppointments extends Object
The DBAppointments Class which handles queries to the appointments table of the client_schedule database

FUTURE ENHANCEMENT: (1) Pass array or list objects to the methods to reduce parameter size. Parse through the array/list inside the method. (2) Make the creation of appointment objects more efficient. Perhaps a warehouse class would be useful.

    • addAppointment

      public static void addAppointment(int apptId, String title, String desc, String loca, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int customerId, int userId, int contactId) throws SQLException
      AddAppointment method which manages the creation of new appointment in the database
      Parameters:
      apptId - The id of the appointment
      title - The title of the appointment
      desc - The description of the appointment
      loca - The location of the appointment
      type - The type of the appointment
      start - The start datetime of the appointment
      end - The end datetime of the appointment
      customerId - The customer id of the appointment
      userId - The user id of the appointment
      contactId - The contact id of the appointment
      Throws:
      SQLException - Signals an SQLException has occurred

    • updateAppointment

      public static void updateAppointment(int id, String title, String desc, String loca, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int custId, int uId, int contId) throws SQLException
      Update appointment method which manages the modification of an existing appointment
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the appointment
      title - The title of the appointment
      desc - The description of the appointment
      loca - The location of the appointment
      type - The type of the appointment
      start - The start datetime of the appointment
      end - The end datetime of the appointment
      custId - The customer id of the appointment
      uId - The user id of the appointment
      contId - The contact id of the appointment
      Throws:
      SQLException - Signals an SQLException has occurred

    • getAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointments(String filter)
      GetAppointments method which manages the retrieval of appointments from the database

      This method can return all appointments, appointments within a month, or appointments within a week

      Parameters:
      filter - The amount of appointments the user wants to see (all, month, week)
      Returns:
      All appointments or filtered version of all appointments

    • deleteAppointment

      public static boolean deleteAppointment(Appointment appt) throws SQLException
      DeleteAppointment class which manages the deletion of appointments from the database
      Parameters:
      appt - Appointment to be deleted
      Returns:
      A boolean value indicating the success of the deletion
      Throws:
      SQLException - Signals an SQLException has occurred

    • getApptCountByCustomer

      public static int getApptCountByCustomer(Customer customer) throws SQLException
      GetApptCountByCustomer (Get Appointment Count by Customer) method which manages the retrieval of a count of appointments a given customer is currently scheduled for from the database.
      Parameters:
      customer - Customer to count appointments for
      Returns:
      A count of appointments for the given customer
      Throws:
      SQLException - Signals an SQLException has occurred

    • getApptTimesByCustomer

      public static ArrayList<LocalDateTime> getApptTimesByCustomer(Customer customer, String apptId) throws SQLException
      GetApptTimesByCustomer (Get Appointment Times by Customer) method which manages the retrieval of appointment times for a given customer from the database.
      Parameters:
      customer - Customer to find appointment times for
      apptId - Appointment ID to exclude from the search (or null)
      Returns:
      A list of start and end LocalDateTimes
      Throws:
      SQLException - Signals an SQLException has occurred

    • getAppointmentsByContact

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentsByContact(String contact)
      GetAppointmentByContact method which manages the retrieval of appointments for a given contact from the database
      Parameters:
      contact - Contact to find appointments for
      Returns:
      List of appointments for the given contact

    • getAllAppointmentTypes

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getAllAppointmentTypes()
      GetAllAppointmentTypes method which manages the retrieval of all distinct appointment types from the database
      Returns:
      A list of distinct appointment types

    • getCountApptsByTypeAndMonth

      public static int getCountApptsByTypeAndMonth(String type, String month)
      GetCountApptsByTypeAndMonth (Get count of appointments by type and month) method which manages the retrieval of a count of appointments by a given type and a given month from the database.
      Parameters:
      type - Type of appointment to count
      month - Month of appointment to count
      Returns:
      an integer (or zero) of how many appointments by month and type exist

    • hasAppointmentSoon

      public static Appointment hasAppointmentSoon(int userId)
      HasAppointmentSoon method which manages the retrieval of an appointment that starts within 15 minutes of the user logging in (if one exists) from the database
      Parameters:
      userId - User id to search for associated appointments
      Returns:
      An Appointment (or null)
